patthana23.24:1.1_0: Nasavitakkasavicāraṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā savitakkasavicāro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.24:2.1_0: Nasavitakkasavicāraṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā savitakkasavicāro akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.24:3.1_0: Nasavitakkasavicāraṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca avitakkaavicāro abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.24:3.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā satta, adhipatiyā satta …pe… avigate satta.
